law.text: All of the provisions of this subtitle are applicable to underwriters at Lloyd's who are nonresidents of this state, or who maintain their principal office outside of this state, in the same manner that they are applicable to underwriters of Lloyd's who are residents of this state and who maintain their principal office in this state.
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 28, sec. 8, effective June 18, 1970.
